### Chart A

```{r}
library(tidyquant)


AAPL <-
  tq_get("AAPL") 
AAPL %>%
  ggplot(aes(x = date, y = close)) +
  geom_line() +
  labs(title = "AAPL: Daily Closing Price", y = "Closing Price", x = "") +
  theme_bw()


```
